question: Can you please inform me of the proper method to perform prayer and including Dua in it, according to Saudi Arabia?
answer:
QUESTION

Can you please inform me of the proper method to perform prayer and including Dua in it, according to Saudi Arabia?

This is what i can come up with... is this correct? 1. Dua El isteftah 2. Allah Akbar 3. El Fateha 4. Verse from Quran 5. Raka'a with Subhana Rabiyya Al Azeem said three times 6. Sameea Allah Leman Hamidoh rabena wa laka al hamd 7. Dua - Hamdan katheeran tayeban...men shay'en ba3d 8. Allah Akbar 9. Sobhan Rabeya Al A3la said three times 10. Allah Akbar 11. Allah Akbar 12. Sobhan rabeya Al A3la said three times 13. Dua - Rabbi eghferly wa erhamny...al tawab al raheem 14. Allah Akbar 15. El Fateha 16. Verse from Quran 17. Raka'a with Subhana Rabiyya Al Azeem said three times 18. Sameea Allah Leman Hamidoh rabena wa laka al hamd 19. Dua - Hamdan katheeran tayeban...men shayee ba3d 20. Allah Akbar 21. Sobhan Rabeya Al A3la said three times 21. Allah Akbar 22. Allah Akbar 23. Sobhan rabeya Al A3la said three times 24. Dua - Rabbi eghferly wa erhamny...al tawab al raheem 25. Al Tashahood 26. Dua - Allahom enee a3ooth bek...enta Alwahab 27. Al Salam 3aleykom wa rahmat allah, Al Salam 3allaykom wa rahmat allah 28. Dua - Astaghfor Allah...wa al hamdo lelah we allah akbar.

ANSWER
